alert.note: Alert for Eastern Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 4:24AM AKDT until March 19 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Visibilities reduced to one half mile or less at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Aleutians. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers, heavy at times, will continue through late Saturday night. Visibility will fluctuate up and down over short periods of time due to variability in shower and wind intensity.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
